meanings.definition: The state or quality of being complicated.
meanings.sent1: The complicatednesses of the puzzle left me feeling puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The complicatednesses of the situation made it hard to solve.
meanings.sent3: Dealing with the complicatednesses of the new video game was a real brain-teaser.
meanings.sent4: The complicatednesses of the legal system were like a maze of rules and regulations.
meanings.sent5: Her explanation of the complicatednesses was as clear as mud.

meanings.definition: The presence of multiple interconnected elements or factors that make something difficult to understand or deal with.
meanings.sent1: The complicatednesses of the machinery made it hard to fix.
meanings.sent2: The complicatednesses of the project required careful planning.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unravel the complicatednesses of the plot in the movie was like solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The complicatednesses of the problem were like untangling a knot.
meanings.sent5: The complicatednesses of the science experiment were like a web of connections.
